itemInfo.itemDesc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Drying rhino, pig, or cow hide. It requires the knowledge of Drying: Beginner.

※ Find Techthon in Heidel and complete the Need for Soft Hide! Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Rhino Hide
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Tanning a hunted rhino corpse.

item.name: Pig Hide
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Tanning a hunted pig corpse.

item.name: Ox Hide
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Tanning a hunted cow corpse.

item.name: Tough Hide
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Drying rhino, pig, or cow hide.

item.name: Zereth Shoes
item.desc: High-quality armor which gives less fatigue to its wearer\n- Put on 2 or more parts to trigger the set effect

item.name: Zereth Gloves
item.desc: High-quality armor which gives less fatigue to its wearer\n- Put on 2 or more parts to trigger the set effect

item.name: Zereth Armor
item.desc: High-quality armor which gives less fatigue to its wearer\n- Put on 2 or more parts to trigger the set effect

item.name: Zereth Helmet
item.desc: High-quality armor which gives less fatigue to its wearer\n- Put on 2 or more parts to trigger the set effect

item.name: Light Hide Stirrups
item.desc:
Sturdier and lighter stirrup made of high-quality leather
Makes you able to attack while riding.
- Able to attach on : Horse & Camel
Able to enhance with Black Stone(Armor)

item.name: Light Hide Saddle
item.desc:
Sturdier and lighter saddle made of high-quality leather
Increases stability for faster riding.
- Able to attach on : Horse & Camel & Donkey
Able to enhance with Black Stone(Armor)

item.name: Light Hide Barding
item.desc: Horse helmet made of high-quality leather. Stronger than normal leather helmet.\n- Able to attach on : Horse & Camel\nAble to enhance with Black Stone(Armor)

item.name: Grunil Armor
item.desc: Custom made armor for fastidious adventurers\n-Put on 2 or more parts to trigger the set effect

item.name: Grunil Helmet
item.desc: Custom made armor for fastidious adventurers\n-Put on 2 or more parts to trigger the set effect

item.name: Grunil Gloves of Iron Wall
item.desc:
Iron Wall energy is contained within these Grunil Gloves.
- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Grunil Gloves of Iron Wall, Grunil Gloves

item.desc:

item.name: Supreme Tough Hide
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Shaking Fine Tough Hide and Leather Glaze, an ingredient made through Alchemy. It requires the knowledge of Shaking: Skilled.

※ Shaking: Skilled can be obtained as a challenge reward after achieving Processing Artisan Level 1.
